name: Circle Of Life
detailed_description:
In the coming decades, due to the rapid deterioration of the Earth's environment, various diseases have spread worldwide like the plague of the Middle Ages. The probability of infectious diseases and cancer has risen sharply in mankind, and the cure rate of traditional treatment has dropped to over the years lowest point.

Under the severe environmental deterioration, large-scale pharmaceutical companies began to devote a great deal of manpower and financial resources to studying Nano Core Robot (NCR) for treatment, finally achieved a great breakthrough. Since then, a new turning point has been ushered in in the war against viruses and diseases, and NCR seems to be the dawn of humanity in this war, but the problems do not seem to be as simple as surface. Undercurrent surging behind this war.

Players will play an NCR lab staff from a large pharmaceutical company, from the perspective of the operator into this war, personally involved in the war between the NCR and the disease! .

       -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------

Game Features


  • Game prototype from 2017 Global Game Jam, the subject of "Waves".
  • The fantastic scene of the micro-world is demonstrated by Low Poly's art style.
  • The diseases, viruses, etc. in the game came from the reality, but at the same time, we carried out some science fiction processing.
  • Support 2-4 people with the screen collaboration or battle, support for computer mouse and keyboard and the market most of the mainstream handle, including PS, XBOX handle operation.
  • Lurking in the body a variety of risk factors, you have to face not only the threat of viruses or cancer cells, but even the "guards" that come from the body's own immune system, System, you are also "intruder."
  • The game name "Circle of Life" is a tribute to The Lion King.

short_description: In the coming decades, a huge breakthrough in nano-medical technology will bring a new light to cure terminally ill patients. As a nano-robot operator, you will be involved in a battle between nanobots and diseases!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 gb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
